status: Daure's Crown ; Davre no Oukan ; Davre's Crown ; ダヴルの王冠
description:
Description :
        The setting is a church in Japan. The main character is Rui, the strongest former hitman. It's a violence and comedy about a group of hitmen protected by the church!
